name: Life in Santa County
storyline: Santa county… A symbol of wealth and peace. But what if it really isn't? A young boy, living in a neighborhood where everything seems so ordinary and innocent, and then discovers the dark and lustful lifestyles lurking within. Witness all the destruction he will experience and the great change he will make. This city has only one rule. Trust… No one.
summary: Life in Santa county is an adult visual novel that focuses on you discovering the dark side of your seemingly peaceful town. Featuring fully animated scenes, in game phone with messaging, a point system and custom crafted characters.
